titles.title: Be Exalted, O God, Above The Heavens

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I will give thanks to Thee, O Lord, among the people,
I will sing praises to Thee among the nations.
For Thy steadfast love is great,
Is great to the heavens,
And Thy faithfulness, Thy faithfulness to the clouds.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Chorus
Be exalted, O God, above the heavens.
Let Thy glory be over all the earth (x3)

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Be exalted, O God, above the heavens.
Let Thy glory, let Thy glory,
Let Thy glory be over all the earth.
